title: Sheba’s Rebellion
summary: A man named Sheba leads a new rebellion against David. Joab murders Amasa to reclaim command of the army. Sheba hides in a city, which is spared when a wise woman negotiates his execution to end the revolt.

faq.question: Who was Sheba?
faq.answer: A rebel from the tribe of Benjamin who challenged David’s rule.

faq.question: How did the rebellion end?
faq.answer: A wise woman in the city had Sheba killed and threw his head over the wall to Joab.
